dct_description_sm: This line data layer represents streams for Colorado in 2003. The dataset was originally published by the Colorado Department of Transportation on December 31, 2003.[Features in this dataset represent linear bodies of water, such as rivers, streams, and irrigation ditches. Features are represented by polyline (linear) geographic shapes.To form a full set of hydrography for the state of Colorado, please combine this linear data with the polygonal geographic dataset named LAKES.]
